professions.name: Barbarian
professions.description: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage

professions.name: Bard
professions.description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation

professions.name: Cleric
professions.description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher

professions.name: Druid
professions.description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature and adopting animal forms

professions.name: Fighter
professions.description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor

professions.name: Monk
professions.description: A master of martial combat, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection

professions.name: Paladin
professions.description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath

professions.name: Ranger
professions.description: A warrior who combats threats on the edges of civilization

professions.name: Rogue
professions.description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies

professions.name: Sorcerer
professions.description: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline

professions.name: Warlock
professions.description: A wielder of magic that is derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity

professions.name: Wizard
professions.description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality

name: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

professions.name: Artificer
professions.description: Masters of unlocking magic in everyday objects, artificers are supreme inventors

professions.name: Blood Hunter
professions.description: A fanatical slayer that embraces dark knowledge to destory evil
